name: browser_browserbase
description: Browser automation via Browserbase. The executor (Claude Code + Browserbase) can navigate URLs, fill forms, scrape content, take screenshots, and interact with public web pages.
constraints: Fresh browser per run unless session is configured. Use for public pages, form submissions, and web-based workflows. No persistent login unless explicitly set up.

name: code_execution
description: Code and script execution. The executor (Claude Code) can run Python/Node scripts, call HTTP APIs, read and write files, and run shell commands in its environment.
constraints: Runs in the executor's sandbox. Use for data processing, API calls, file I/O, and automation that does not require a browser.

name: file_and_api
description: File system and API access. Read/write local files, call external APIs (REST, etc.), and integrate with services that expose HTTP endpoints.
constraints: Subject to executor environment and network. Use for integrations that have a public or configured API.
